mapper.insert: insert into board(userid, title, content, thumbnailImg, img1, img2, img3, category) value(#{userid},#{title},#{content}, #{thumbnailImg}, #{img1}, #{img2}, #{img3}, #{category})
mapper.select: select b.no, b.title, b.category, date_format(b.createdate, "%m/%d %H:%i") createdate, b.thumbnailImg, b.pick, b.views, b.price, m.nickname from board b join member m on b.userid=m.userid order by no desc limit ${recordPerPage} offset ${offsetIndex}
select category from board where category=#{param1} limit 1

select b.no, m.nickname, m.userid, b.category, b.title, b.views, date_format(b.createdate, "%m/%d %H:%i")createdate, b.thumbnailImg, b.img1, b.img2, b.img3, b.price, b.content from board b join member m on b.userid=m.userid where no=${no} order by b.no desc;
mapper.update: update board set views=views+1 where no=#{param1}
mapper.select: select no, category, title, content, thumbnailImg, img1, img2, img3 from board where no=#{param1}
select thumbnailImg, img1, img2, img3 from board where no=${param1}
